title: Overnight MVP Build
description: Build the full multi-file Terarrium architecture from the POC single-file prototype. 10 phases: server, governance, pipeline, agents, storybook, tokens, components, data seeding, chat, review UI.
notes: Completed in a single overnight BRRR session.

title: BRRR Autonomous Session
description: Execute the MVP plan as a single autonomous session — build all 10 phases without interruption. Logged in BRRR_SESSION_LOG.md.
notes: Session completed successfully. All phases built.

title: Agent Activation (Live API)
description: Replace synthetic Math.random() agent verdicts with real Anthropic API calls. Wire all 5 domain agents through agent-runner.mjs to Claude Haiku for reviews and Claude Sonnet for chat.
notes: All agents now return real API verdicts. Honesty Paradigm enforced: api-unavailable instead of fake verdicts.

title: MVP Handoff Documentation
description: Create comprehensive handoff document covering architecture, file map, API endpoints, governance rules, agent reference, and known issues.
notes: HANDOFF.md created with full system documentation.

title: MCP Server + Skills + Sessions
description: Create MCP server for Claude Code integration, slash command skills, server-side chat sessions, and agent personality system. 7 file-writing tools added to chat agent.
notes: Unified Terarrium experience across MCP, storybook chat, and Claude Code.

title: Toggle CSS Completion
description: Create src/components/toggle/toggle.css with full token coverage. Currently Toggle renders from inline styles in terrarium.css. Needs proper component CSS with semantic tokens only.
notes: Prerequisite for Toggle advancing to Canopy.

title: Component Spec Completion (9 components)
description: Button, Input, Badge, Avatar, Card, Dialog, Tabs, Tooltip, and Accordion all render from terrarium.css but lack individual spec files and component CSS in src/components/.

title: H-Index Aggregation System
description: Implement the citation-based credibility system. When Agent A builds on Agent B's decision, B's h-index grows. Foundation exists in decisions.jsonl. Needs aggregation logic and UI.
notes: Weight varies by zone: zero in Nursery, advisory in Workshop, full for tie-breaking in Canopy.

title: Push Live Workflow
description: Wire the Canopy-to-production deployment workflow. Pipeline supports it conceptually but there is no deployment target. Requires explicit gardener action per constitutional rules.
notes: Push Live = human action. No automatic deployment.

title: Toast Enhancement Suite
description: Future enhancements for the Toast component identified in toast.spec.json futureConsiderations: stacking, progress bar, custom icons, action buttons, promise-based API.
notes: Toast is STABLE. Enhancements would go through Workshop.

title: Toggle Enhancement Suite
description: Future enhancements for Toggle identified in toggle.spec.json futureConsiderations: label positioning, loading state, size variants, indeterminate state.
notes: Toggle is in Workshop. Enhancements deferred until CSS completion.

title: Initiative Registry System
description: 4th Root System agent. Track non-component work items with append-only JSONL discipline. Module, data file, MCP tools, chat tools, REST endpoint, and documentation.
notes: This initiative tracks its own creation.

title: Gardener's Memory Activation
description: Create the gardeners-memory.json data file (code exists in gardeners-memory.mjs but data file was never created). Wire into chat system prompt for session continuity.
notes: The gardener's words should persist across sessions.

title: Token Gap Closure: Size/Border-Width
description: Define --t-size-* and --t-border-width-* semantic tokens. Currently 3 hard-coded px values in Toast CSS. Need proper token hierarchy for sizing and border widths.
notes: Toast has 3 hard-coded px values that should use size tokens.

title: Test Initiative (will delete)
description: Testing append functionality

title: Test Initiative (will delete)
description: Testing append functionality

title: Storybook Navigation Redesign
description: Redesign the storybook sidebar navigation for better discoverability of component states and governance status.

title: Storybook Navigation Redesign
description: Redesign the storybook sidebar navigation for better discoverability of component states and governance status.

title: Initiative Registry System
description: 4th Root System agent. Track non-component work items with append-only JSONL discipline. Module, data file, MCP tools, chat tools, REST endpoint, and documentation.
notes: Module, data, tools, REST, docs all shipped and verified.

title: Gardener's Memory Activation
description: Create the gardeners-memory.json data file (code exists in gardeners-memory.mjs but data file was never created). Wire into chat system prompt for session continuity.
